elements.description:
`api-headers-editor`
An element to render headers edior based on AMF data model.

By default it renders headers form. The user has an option to switch to
source editing mode. `code-mirror` element is used in the later case.

## AMF data model

This element renders pre-configured form of headers based on
[AMF's](https://github.com/mulesoft/amf) json/ld data model.
From the model select `http://raml.org/vocabularies/http#header`
node which contains list of headers defined for current object
(it can be method, trait, security scheme etc).
The model is resolved to internal data model by `api-view-model-transformer`
element.

If the element is used without AMF model `allowCustom` property must be
set or otherwise user won't be able to add new header to the editor.

### Example

```html
<api-headers-editor id="editor" allow-disable-params></api-headers-editor>
<script>
let data = await getAmfModel();
data = data[0]['http://raml.org/vocabularies/document#encodes'][0];
data = data['http://raml.org/vocabularies/http#endpoint'][0];
data = data['http://www.w3.org/ns/hydra/core#supportedOperation'][0];
data = data['http://www.w3.org/ns/hydra/core#expects'][0];
data = data['http://raml.org/vocabularies/http#header'];
(first endpoint, first method, headers array)
editor.amfModel = data;
editor.addEventListener('value-changed', (e) => console.log(e.detail.value));
< /script>
```

### Example without AMF

```html
<api-headers-editor id="editor" allow-disable-params allow-custom></api-headers-editor>
<script>
editor.addEventListener('value-changed', (e) => console.log(e.detail.value));
< /script>
```

properties.name: isPayload
properties.description:
Set to true when the request can carry a payload.
It's required for calculating headers errors.

properties.name: eventsTarget
properties.description:
Events handlers target. By default the element listens on
`window` object. If set, all events listeners will be attached to this
object instead of `window`.

properties.name: _oldEventsTarget
properties.description: An event target used to attach listeners.

properties.name: model
properties.description: View model to use to render the form.

properties.name: optionalOpened
properties.description: Set to true to show optional parameters (not required by the API).

properties.name: hasOptional
properties.description:
Computed value from `allowHideOptional` and view model.
`true` if current model has any optional property.

properties.name: allowHideOptional
properties.description:
If set it computes `hasOptional` property and shows checkbox in the
form to show / hide optional properties.

properties.name: renderOptionalCheckbox
properties.description: Computed flag to determine if optional checkbox can be rendered

properties.name: allowDisableParams
properties.description:
If set, enable / disable param checkbox is rendered next to each
form item.

properties.name: allowCustom
properties.description:
When set, renders "add custom" item button.
If the element is to be used withouth AMF model this should always
be enabled. Otherwise users won't be able to add a parameter.

properties.name: renderEmptyMessage
properties.description:
Computed value. The form renders empty message (if supported by
the form element). It occurs when model is not set and allowCustom
is not set

properties.name: viewModel
properties.description:
Generated view model fore the headers from `amfModel`.
This is automatically set when `amfModel` is set.

properties.name: contentType
properties.description:
Value of a Content-Type header.
When this value change then editor update the value for the content type. However,
to change a single header value, please, use `request-headers-changed` event with `name`
and `value` properties set on the detail object.

properties.name: sourceMode
properties.description: When set to true then the source edit mode is enabled

properties.name: _contentTypeRe
properties.description: Regexp to search for content type value

methods.name: filterHeaders
methods.description:
Filter array of headers and return not duplicated array of the same headers.
Duplicated headers should be appended to already found one using coma separator.

params.name: headers
params.description:
Headers array to filter. All objects in headers array must have "name"
               and "value" keys.

methods.name: headersToString
methods.description: Parse headers array to Raw HTTP headers string.

params.name: headersArray
params.description:
List of objects with "name" and "value"
properties.

return.desc: A HTTP representation of the headers.

methods.name: headerItemToString
methods.description:
Transforms a header model item to a string.
Array values are supported.

methods.name: headersToJSON
methods.description:
Parse HTTP headers input from string to array of objects containing `name` and `value`
properties.

params.name: headers
params.description: Raw HTTP headers input or Headers object

return.desc:
The array of objects where properties are `name` as a header
name and `value` as a header content.

methods.name: _headersStringToJSON
methods.description:
Parse headers string to array of objects.
See `#toJSON` for more info.

methods.name: _hedersToJSON
methods.description:
Parse Headers object to array of objects.
See `#toJSON` for more info.

methods.name: _oldCombine
methods.description:
Helper method for old system: combine headers list with encoding value.
Note that this function will update the original array.

params.name: encoding
params.description: An encoding string from the old request.

return.desc: True if encoding has been added to the array.

methods.name: getContentType
methods.description: Get the Content-Type value from the headers.

params.name: headers
params.description: Either HTTP headers string or list of headers.

return.desc: A content-type header value or null if not found

methods.name: replaceHeaderValue
methods.description: Replace value for given header in the headers list.

params.name: headers
params.description:
A headers object. Can be string, array of objects or
Headers object.

methods.name: getHeaderError
methods.description: Get error message for given header string.

return.desc: An error message or null if the headers are valid.

methods.name: _eventsTargetChanged
methods.description:
Removes old handlers (if any) and attaches listeners on new event
event target.

params.name: eventsTarget
params.description:
Event target to set handlers on. If not set it
will set handlers on the `window` object.

methods.name: computeFormRowClass
methods.description: Computes class name for each form item depending on the item state.

params.name: optionalOpened
params.description: True if optional parameters are rendered.

methods.name: toggleOptionalParams
methods.description: Toggles visibility of optional parameters.

methods.name: _getForm
methods.description:
Returns a reference to the form element, if the DOM is ready.
This only works with `iron-form` that is in the DOM.

return.desc:
Iron form element. It may be `undefined` if local
DOM is not yet initialized.

methods.name: _getValidity
methods.description:
Validates the form. It uses `iron-form`'s `validate()` function to
perform the validation.

return.desc: Validation result or `true` if DOM is not yet ready.

methods.name: serializeForm
methods.description: Link to the form's serialize function.

return.desc:
Serialized form values or `undefined` if DOM is not ready.
Note, `undefined` is returned **only** if DOM is not yet ready.

methods.name: _computeHasOptionalParameters
methods.description:
Computes if any of the parameters are required.
It iterates over the model to find any first element that has `required`
propeerty set to `false`.

params.name: allowHideOptional
params.description:
State of `allowHideOptional` property.
If `false` this function always returns `false`.

params.name: record
params.description:
Change record. Note, it does not checks for
optional parameters each time the model changes. It rescans the model
when splices changed.

return.desc: `true` if model has at leas one alement that is not required.

methods.name: _computeRenderCheckbox
methods.description: Computes value for `renderOptionalCheckbox` property.

methods.name: _computeIsCustom
methods.description:
Computes if given model item is a custom property (not generated by
AMF model transformation).

return.desc:
`true` if `isCustom` property is set on model's schema
property.

methods.name: addCustom
methods.description:
Adds empty custom property to the list.

It dispatches `api-property-model-build` custom event that is handled by
`api-view-model-transformer` to build model item.
This assumem that the transformer element is already in the DOM.

After the transformation the element pushes or sets the data to the
`model`.

params.name: opts
params.description:
Additional options:
- inputLabel {String} - Forces a label of the input

methods.name: _removeCustom
methods.description:
Removes custom item from the UI.
This can only be called from `dom-repeat` element so it contain's
`model` property.

methods.name: computeIsOptional
methods.description:
Computes if model item is optional.
The items is always optional if is not required and when `hasOptional`
is set to `true`.

return.desc: `true` if the model item is optional in the form.

methods.name: _computeRenderEmptyMessage
methods.description: Computes value for `renderEmptyMessage`.

params.name: allowCustom
params.description: True if the form allows to add custom values.

return.desc: `true` when allowCustom is falsy set and model is empty

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Sets up editor when ready to manipulate DOM.

methods.name: _sourceModeChanged
methods.description:
Handler for `sourceMode` change.

Opens desired editr.

methods.name: _editorValueChanged
methods.description: Updates the value when current editor's value change.

methods.name: modelToValue
methods.description: Creates a headers string from a model.

params.name: model
params.description:
Optional, model to process. If not set it uses
`this.viewModel`

methods.name: _cmKeysHandler
methods.description:
Code mirror's ctrl+space key handler.
Opens headers fill support.

methods.name: _modelFromValue
methods.description:
Called when switching from source view to form view.
Updates view model with values defined in text editor.

Only headers existing in `value` are going to be present in the model.
Otherwise headers will be disabled.

It does nothing if `value` or `viewModel` is not defined.

methods.name: _findModelIndex
methods.description: Finds item position in model by name.

return.desc: Items position or `-1` if not found.

methods.name: createCustom
methods.description: Creates a custom header model item.

methods.name: _headersChangedHandler
methods.description:
Handler tor the `request-headers-changed` event.
Updates the editor value to the value of the event detail object.

methods.name: _headerChangedHandler
methods.description:
Handler for the `request-header-changed` event.
It updates value for a single header.

methods.name: _detectContentType
methods.description: Detects and sets content type value from changed headers value.

methods.name: _valueChanged
methods.description:
Called by CodeMirror editor.
When something change n the headers list, detect content type header.

methods.name: _setValues
methods.description: Updates `value` when new value is computed by the editor.

methods.name: _copyToClipboard
methods.description: Coppies current response text value to clipboard.

elements.name: ApiElements.ApiHeadersEditor

attributes.name: is-payload
attributes.description:
Set to true when the request can carry a payload.
It's required for calculating headers errors.

attributes.name: events-target
attributes.description:
Events handlers target. By default the element listens on
`window` object. If set, all events listeners will be attached to this
object instead of `window`.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: View model to use to render the form.

attributes.name: optional-opened
attributes.description: Set to true to show optional parameters (not required by the API).

attributes.name: has-optional
attributes.description:

`true` if current model has any optional property.

attributes.description:
If set it computes `hasOptional` property and shows checkbox in the

attributes.name: render-optional-checkbox

attributes.name: allow-disable-params

If set, enable / disable param checkbox is rendered next to each
form item.

attributes.name: allow-custom
attributes.description:
When set, renders "add custom" item button.
If the element is to be used withouth AMF model this should always
be enabled. Otherwise users won't be able to add a parameter.

attributes.description:

the form element). It occurs when model is not set and allowCustom
is not set

attributes.name: view-model
attributes.description:
Generated view model fore the headers from `amfModel`.
This is automatically set when `amfModel` is set.

attributes.name: content-type
attributes.description:
Value of a Content-Type header.
When this value change then editor update the value for the content type. However,
to change a single header value, please, use `request-headers-changed` event with `name`
and `value` properties set on the detail object.

attributes.name: source-mode
attributes.description: When set to true then the source edit mode is enabled
